channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description: how do i makeit so i can spawn silab stuff too? and how do i edit the prices for shops? [br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2007, 08:54:03 PM[/size][hr]can no one answer this?

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Replace your ::pickup command with this

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

Then Search for 10000 and replace it with 20000
and keep searching 10000 til u get all them to 20000

Then go into Item.java and search:

public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[10000]; public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[10000]; public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[10000]; public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[10000]; public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[10000];

Replace it with:

public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[20000]; public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[20000]; public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[20000]; public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[20000]; public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[20000];

Read full topic
